London Based Museum Founded in 1965

It's not a Museum, It's a Place of Living Ideas

EST.

1965

The Art & History Museum is One of the World's Major Institutes.

Found in 1965 as an educational institution based in London. The Art & Histry Museum is committed to producing distinctive exhibitions and public programming on contemporary Japanese and Asian Art
